author: prbuzz.com
title: Wholesale Travel Website Announces Launch
text:
New York, New York – Hoprocket™ Travel is pleased to announce the launch of their new travel website, geared towards travelers seeking travel deals at a fraction of the cost that retail outlets charge. HopRocket™ has brought the same business model pioneered by companies like Costco and Sam's Club in retail to the travel industry. This allows a traveler to make travel purchases at wholesale prices far below what any other booking engine can offer.
“Hoprocket™ is great not only because we find the best possible travel deals, but once we find the lowest rate offered by competitors, we undercut them between 20 and 30%,” Says Andrea Pellini, Independent Hoprocket™ Advocate.
Every travel deal on Hoprocket™ is at a wholesale price. The website offers a comprehensive set of travel destinations as well. Whether a traveler wants to fly to Cancun or take a low cost Caribbean cruise, Hoprocket™ provides the guaranteed lowest price on the Internet.
Pellini says, “Many people think this sounds too good to be true. So, I tell them to try our 30-day free trial to see the power of Hoprocket™ for themselves.”
Hoprocket™ works similarly to membership clubs when it comes to fees. There is a small membership fee that a traveler pays per month or per year, but it can be earned back via HopPoints. This is very similar to a Sam’s Club Plus membership. However, not only does a traveler receive some or all of their membership fee back, they receive deeply discounted deals that are guaranteed to be cheaper than any other travel website on the internet.
Hoprocket™ is now offering a free HopPass for 30 days. Visit their website at: http://HopRocket.travel/travelbooking or send an email to them at the following address: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. .
